1380.verse: قُل|Say,|50|60|765$لَّوْ|"If|41|61|905$شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ|Allah (had) willed,|138|158|180$مَا|not|42|62|262$تَلَوْتُهُۥ|I (would) have recited it|182|202|8055$عَلَيْكُمْ|to you,|79|99|416$وَلَآ|and not|71|81|25$أَدْرَٮٰكُم بِهِۦ‌ۖ|He (would) have made it known to you.|283|295|8056$فَقَدْ|Verily,|61|85|1016$لَبِثْتُ|I have stayed|112|136|2329$فِيكُمْ|among you|92|116|1343$عُمُرًا|a lifetime|80|92|8057$مِّن قَبْلِهِۦٓ‌ۚ|before it.|107|190|3324$أَفَلَا|Then will not|105|270|452$تَعْقِلُونَ|you use reason?"|133|216|453$

1382.verse: وَيَعْبُدُونَ|And they worship|135|144|8058$مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ|other than Allah|143|160|2971$مَا|that (which)|103|120|262$لَا|(does) not|90|107|30$يَضُرُّهُمْ|harm them|96|113|972$وَلَا|and not|71|80|25$يَنفَعُهُمْ|benefit them,|109|117|973$وَيَقُولُونَ|and they say,|112|127|3019$هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ|"These|82|97|335$شُفَعَـٰٓؤُنَا|(are) our intercessors|164|179|8059$عِندَ|with|56|71|521$ٱللَّهِ‌ۚ|Allah."|61|76|606$قُلْ|Say,|50|58|765$أَتُنَبِّــُٔونَ|"Do you inform|116|125|8060$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|72|184$بِمَا|of what|71|90|43$لَا يَعْلَمُ|He does not know|139|158|8061$فِى|in|48|67|89$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|134|351$وَلَا|and not|71|80|25$فِى|in|48|83|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ‌ۚ|the earth?"|94|164|100$سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ|Glorified is He|109|179|1080$وَتَعَـٰلَىٰ|and Exalted|97|167|5903$عَمَّا|above what|98|133|724$يُشْرِكُونَ|they associate (with Him).|196|196|7075$

1383.verse: وَمَا|And not|72|90|46$كَانَ|was|57|94|913$ٱلنَّاسُ|the mankind|100|137|112$إِلَّآ|but|42|79|86$أُمَّةً وَٲحِدَةً|one community,|125|162|5020$فَٱخْتَلَفُواْ‌ۚ|then they differed.|145|163|8062$وَلَوْلَا|And had (it) not been|164|193|2238$كَلِمَةٌ|a word|65|123|8063$سَبَقَتْ|(that) preceded|126|184|8064$مِن|from|50|108|53$رَّبِّكَ|your Lord,|87|116|1322$لَقُضِىَ|surely, it (would) have been judged|256|280|5438$بَيْنَهُمْ|between them|115|164|1056$فِيمَا|concerning what|130|179|1058$فِيهِ|[therein]|78|102|32$يَخْتَلِفُونَ|they differ.|99|99|1059$

1379.verse: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, those who do not expect the meeting with Us say, "Bring us a Qur'an other than this or change it." Say, [O Muhammad], "It is not for me to change it on my own accord. I only follow what is revealed to me. Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day."

1380.verse: Say, "If Allah had willed, I would not have recited it to you, nor would He have made it known to you, for I had remained among you a lifetime before it. Then will you not reason?"

1381.verse: So who is more unjust than he who invents a lie about Allah or denies His signs? Indeed, the criminals will not succeed

1382.verse: And they worship other than Allah that which neither harms them nor benefits them, and they say, "These are our intercessors with Allah " Say, "Do you inform Allah of something He does not know in the heavens or on the earth?" Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him

1383.verse: And mankind was not but one community [united in religion], but [then] they differed. And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, it would have been judged between them [immediately] concerning that over which they differ.

1384.verse: And they say, "Why is a sign not sent down to him from his Lord?" So say, "The unseen is only for Allah [to administer], so wait; indeed, I am with you among those who wait."
